title: Compare survey rate of return given bar graph

content.question: Which statement about delivery method and rate of survey return is supported by the graph?

choices.label: There is a positive association between delivery method and rate of return.
There is a negative association between delivery method and rate of return.
The number of surveys given using the Dining Hall delivery method was less than the number given using either of the other delivery methods.
The Psychology delivery method displays the most symmetric results; the other delivery methods display skewed results.
The In Class delivery method had the greatest rate of return, and the Dining Hall delivery method had the least rate of return.

content.answer: The In Class delivery method had the greatest rate of return, and the Dining Hall delivery method had the least rate of return.

topic.text: 1.4: Representing a Categorical Variable with Graphs

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
